Package com.deco2800.game.screens.title

Class TouchTitleInputComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.generic.Component
com.deco2800.game.input.components.InputComponent
com.deco2800.game.screens.title.TouchTitleInputComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureDetector.GestureListener, InputProcessor
public class TouchTitleInputComponent
extends InputComponent
A class made with KeyboardTitleInputComponent to incorporate the "press any key" function for the title. This is being kept in the game as it allows development in touch screen (e.g. mobile). As this game does not require mouse inputs, its controls are simple and keeping this class can leave opportunities open for easier development.
